attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir.

With respect. The scare mongering of cannabis use and psychosis links are very far removed from the truth. 
The studies are unbalanced, as there were no comparisons made.
There is no hard undisputed evidence.
There is no definitive evidence.
Using words such as 'could' and 'might' cause are not good enough.

Our request is this.

Please do not upgrade cannabis use back to B.

Regards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
